title: Why aren't Rioters commenting on posts like they used to?
body:
I've noticed after the Scuttler RNG patch, Rioters on the forums have been nearly none-existent. I saw one Rioter respond to a post about game lore/story, multiple times to the same comment chain, and wondered why they would respond to a random post about League Lore, but not comment at _all_ on why Riot is making the decisions that they are.

A genuine question to Riot, if they bother reading this... why the sudden silence?
